title: Devastation
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and National Films Council of the Motion Picture Industry
brief_description: A plea for the planting of trees throughout Australia to offset damage by bush fires and thoughtless timber cutters. Shows how tree destruction results in soil erosion, floods and water shortage but also how government planting of trees and voluntary planting by community groups can alleviate the problem.
